.flash-sale-progress-bar,
.flash-sale-banner--without-link,
.shop-banner__banner-image,
.full-home-banners__light-background{
    -webkit-filter:brightness(.85);
}


.collection-page__banner-section:hover,
.shopee-chat-root .shopee-chat-container.collapsed:hover,
.ofs-header--docked .ofs-header__toggle--tw:hover,
.item-card-special:hover,
.shopee-item-card--full:hover,
.highlighted-list__item:hover,
.stardust-carousel__item a:hover, 
.stardust-carousel__item img:hover,
.md-image__content:hover,
._26s9h9:hover,
._2ChcoH:hover,
.image-carousel__item a:hover, 
.shopee-avatar__img:hover,
._1JI6mR:hover,
._3gEEk0:hover,
.shopee-skinny-banner__full-height:hover,
.flash-sale-item-card__animated-image:hover,
._1zMZHn:hover,
.ofs-carousel__cover-image:hover,
.flash-sale-progress-bar:hover,
.flash-sale-banner--without-link:hover,
.shop-banner__banner-image:hover,
.full-home-banners__light-background:hover{
    -webkit-filter:brightness(1) ;
}




}

@-moz-document url-prefix("https://shopee.tw/blog"), domain("shopeetwblog.com") {
.copyright,
.top-strip, 
.secondary-menu .sub-menu, 
.top-strip .search-form input[type="text"], 
.top-strip .social li ul{
        background-image:linear-gradient(#444,#666,#444);
}

.header{
    background:#333 !important;
}

html,
head,
body,
.sticky-active .main-menu-fixed,
#masthead
{
    background-color:#333 ;
}
.composer-button .read-more,
.title-with-sep .title, 
.title-with-sep .entry-title{
    background-color:#444;
}

.main-menu-container{
    background-image:linear-gradient(#333,#777,#333);
}


a, .title-with-sep,
.main-menu > ul > li{
    color:#bbb;
}


.main-menu-container{
    border-top-color:#555;
    border-bottom-color:#555;
}

.pagination .current{
    border:1px solid #aaa;
}
}
